comment: Professor Mahan provided a lot of guidance throughout the semester.  She helped me with a serious personal issue.

Class was about as simple as could be. One paper, one presentation, and two incredibly easy, borderline common sense tests. Professor Mahan had her moments where she was quite engaging, but for the most part I felt like I had little reason to be in the classroom.

The best professor you can have for the course. Not too many tests or assignments. And everything was pretty easy. It takes more energy to fail her class because you can easily pass with minimal effort.
